biography:
Vincent Lindon (born July 15, 1959 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine) is a French actor who has been active for more than 25 years.

Lindon was a lover of Princess Caroline of Monaco from 1990 to 1995. He is currently separated from his wife, the French actress Sandrine Kiberlain.

name: Vincent Lindon
